text: Giorgio Ardisson, also known as George Ardisson (31 December 1931 â€“ 11 December 2014), was an Italian actor. He was known for his roles in Agent 3S3: Passport to Hell and Agent 3S3, Massacre in the Sun. Ardisson was born in Turin, Italy. Ardisson died in Rome, Italy, aged 82. ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:People from Turin
